name: fcc-backend-monorepo
description: Monorepo to run FCC-style microservices and a React/Vite frontend together

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix services/timestamp install; npm --prefix services/request-header install; npm --prefix services/url-shortener install; npm --prefix services/image-search install; npm --prefix services/file-metadata install; npm --prefix services/voting install; npm --prefix services/nightlife install; npm --prefix services/stock-market install; npm --prefix services/book-trading install; npm --prefix services/pinterest install; npm --prefix services/exercise-tracker install; npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.start:backend: concurrently -n "timestamp,request-header,url-shortener,image-search,file-metadata,voting,nightlife,stock-market,book-trading,pinterest,exercise" -c "magenta,cyan,green,blue,white,yellow,red,gray,brightBlue,brightMagenta,brightCyan" "npm run --prefix services/timestamp start" "npm run --prefix services/request-header start" "npm run --prefix services/url-shortener start" "npm run --prefix services/image-search start" "npm run --prefix services/file-metadata start" "npm run --prefix services/voting start" "npm run --prefix services/nightlife start" "npm run --prefix services/stock-market start" "npm run --prefix services/book-trading start" "npm run --prefix services/pinterest start" "npm run --prefix services/exercise-tracker start"
